Counter-Strike has evolved over the many years from cs 1.6 to cs source and finally we have global offensive. It is one of the best FPS games there is right now mixing in strategy and skill. If you like team based competitive games, then this is for you.

+
1. Easy to learn hard to master
2. Fast paced
3. Strategy and skill based
4. Fun with friends
5. A lot of tournaments happen in CS:GO
6. Minimal or no bugs and exploitations

-
1. It is quite easy to hack in match making. To counter this, a lot of players use a platform called FaceIt for competitive play, which makes hacking considerably harder and more expensive for hackers.
2. This depends on your region, but overall CS:GO is considered to have a toxic community.
